name: Hell: On another world
description:
Note : This is made for just fun and i dont want to get sued 

Since i played classic doom i loved it and i wanted to make a game about it. 32x game jam looked like a prefect place for me. This is doom but in the house version of the doom . 

Also note that i coded everything so there might be alot of bugs in this game that i dont know about so yeah and if your pistol or shotgun didnt say bang bang anymore im sorry body go back to the main menu and start the game again :) 

There is 3 ending that has a different cutseen that has audios that has been record "Professionally" .

Credits : 

Armor health and ammo : done by me so they are bad :)

Hitler Marine SSG Pistol : The legned himself : Turbo from : https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?t=29204

Door : idk what you talking about and i totally do remember

Textures : 128 x 128 texture assets from itch.io

DoomGuy : Google (please dont sue me i dont know who you are or what you are)

Note : This things that i wrote was from me in 1 am and i wanted to die :)
